title: Here’s How to Watch Miley Cyrus, Charli xcx & Snoop Dogg Present at the 2026 Golden Globes for Free
summary: The 83rd annual Golden Globes are set to take place on Sunday, Jan. 11, at The Beverly Hilton.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Hollywood’s “Party of the Year” is back for another romp, and this year’s nominations are sure to keep fans watching till the very end. Related ‘One Battle After Another,’ ‘The White Lotus’ Lead 2026 Golden Globe Award Nominations: Full List How to Get Affordable Tickets to Alex Warren's 'Finding Family on the Road' 2026 Tour Peach Bowl 2026: How to Watch the Oregon Ducks vs Indiana Hoosiers Game Online for Free The 83rd Annual Golden Globes will air live on both coasts Sunday, Jan. 11, from 8 to 11 p.m. ET via CBS with streaming opportunities on Paramount+. The ceremony will take place at The Beverly Hilton. Comedian Nikki Glaser is back to host the award show for a second year alongside a slew of presenters including music acts such as Charli xcx, Snoop Dogg and Miley Cyrus, along with actors and actresses Chris Pine, Colman Domingo, Connor Storrie, Dakota Fanning, Dave Franco, Diane Lane, Georg…
